profile.profileDescription: Profile configuration for Association Heritage New Brunswick (AHNB)

label.name_singular: To be carried by the Borrower
label.name_plural: To be carried by the Borrower

label.name_singular: To be carried by the Lender
label.name_plural: To be carried by the Lender

label.name_singular: Autre (Voir les remarques sur les dimensions)
label.name_plural: Autre (Voir les remarques sur les dimensions)

label.name: Previous numbers
label.description: Enter any previous numbers or codes in full. A semicolon and a space should separate multiple entries.

label.name: Numéros précédents
label.description: Cette zone contient tout numéro précédent qui a été assigné à l’objet.

label.name: Category
label.description: This field contains the level of classification for the object based on the Chenhall’s Nomenclature.

label.name: Catégorie de l'objet
label.description: Cette zone contient le deuxième niveau de classification de l'objet. Ce qui correspond au niveau « Sous-catégorie » des systèmes de classification de Parcs Canada, du Réseau Info-Muse ou de Chenhall.

label.name: Catégorie
label.description: Ce champ contient le niveau de classification principal de l'objet. Cela correspondrait au niveau "Catégorie" au sein des systèmes de classification Parks, Info-Muse et Chenhall.

label.name: Category
label.description: This field contains the primary level of classification for the object. This would correspond with the “Category” level within the Parks, Info-Muse, and Chenhall classification systems.

label.name: Sous-catégorie
label.description: Cette zone contient le deuxième niveau de classification de l'objet. Ce qui correspond au niveau « Sous-catégorie » des systèmes de classification de Parcs Canada, du Réseau Info-Muse ou de Chenhall.

label.name: Sub-category
label.description: This field contains the second level of classification for the object. This would correspond with the “Sub-category” level within the Parks, InfoMuse, and Chenhall classification systems.

label.name: Fonds
label.description: A Fonds is all the records created, used and accumulated by a single organization, individual or juridical person during the transaction of daily business. All archival records are organized by fonds.

label.name: Fonds
label.description: Un Fonds est l'ensemble des enregistrements créés, utilisés et accumulés par une seule organisme, personne physique ou juridique lors de la transaction quotidienne. Tous les documents d'archives sont organisés par fonds.

label.name: Sous-fonds
label.description: Un sous-fonds est l'ensemble des enregistrements d'une sous-unité administrative de l'organisation qui a créé le fonds.

label.name: Sub-fonds
label.description: A sub-fonds is all the records of an administrative sub-unit of the organization that created the fonds.

label.name: Number of components
label.description: This field indicates the number of component parts of the object.

label.name: Nombre de parties composantes
label.description: Cette zone contient le nombre de parties détachables de l’objet.

label.name: Component part names
label.description: This field contains the name(s) of the component parts separated by a semicolon and a space.

label.name: Noms des parties composantes
label.description: Cette zone contient les noms de parties constituant un objet.

label.name: Begin and End Dates
label.description: This field indicates the earliest date of a span of dates when the object was created, manufactured, or formed. If the object was created over more than one year, this field indicates the latest date of the span of dates when the object was created, manufactured, or formed. Example 1862-1865.

label.name: Date de début de production ou Date de fin de production
label.description: Ce champ indique la date la plus ancienne d'une période de dates où l'objet a été créé, fabriqué ou formé. Si l'objet a été créé pendant plus d'un an, ce champ indique la date la plus récente de la durée des dates où l'objet a été créé, fabriqué ou formé. Exemple 1862-1865.

label.name: Discipline
label.description: This field names the discipline or branch of learning under which the object may fall.

label.name: Discipline
label.description: Cette zone mentionne la discipline ou le champ de connaissances qui régit l'étude du spécimen.

label.name: Description
label.description: This field contains text to describe the object, and is used for physical descriptive information that may supplement, qualify, or explain information indexed in various other fields.

label.name: Description
label.description: Cette zone contient des renseignements descriptifs qui ne figurent pas dans d'autres zones. Inscrire une description physique de l’objet qui ne figure dans aucune autre zone.

label.name: Material
label.description: This field lists the materials used to make a three-dimensional object such as a sculpture, historical artifact or ethnographic artifact. Materials are listed from the most to the least predominant.

label.name: Matériaux
label.description: Cette zone contient la liste du ou des matériaux ayant servi à la fabrication de l’objet. Inscrire les termes dans l’ordre naturel, sans inversion. Inscrire les matériaux du plus utilisé au moins utilisé.

label.name: Medium
label.description: This field lists the methods, processes or materials used to create a two-dimensional object such as a painting, print or photograph.

label.name: Médium
label.description: Cette zone contient le nom d’un médium ou d’un moyen ayant servi à la création d'une œuvre à deux dimensions, par exemple une peinture, une gravure ou une photographie.

label.name: Technique
label.description: This field lists, from most to least predominant the processes, methods or techniques used to create the object.

label.name: Technique
label.description: Cette zone décrit les procédés, les méthodes ou les techniques de fabrication d'un objet.

label.name: Support
label.description: This field lists, starting with the primary support, the support material used for a two-dimensional object such as a painting, print or photograph.

label.name: Support
label.description: Cette zone décrit les matériaux utilisés comme support principal d'une œuvre à deux dimensions, par exemple une peinture, une gravure ou photographie.

label.name: Colour
label.description: This field contains the colours of the object being registered. A colour chart such as Munsell may be used. A semicolon and a space should separate multiple entries.

label.name: Couleur
label.description: Cette zone indique les couleurs de l'objet sur lequel porte l'enregistrement. On peut se servir d'une table de couleurs comme celle de Munsell. Séparer les entrées multiples par un point-virgule suivi d'un blanc.

label.name: Marks/Labels
label.description: This field contains a description of the maker's marks or labels associated with the object.

label.name: Étiquette ou poinçon
label.description: Cette zone contient une description des poinçons ou étiquettes du fabricant associés à l'objet.

label.name: Inscription
label.description: This field contains the inscription or transliteration of the inscription found on the object. An inscription consists of the actual words in the original language and script on the object. A transliteration is the corresponding English or French.

label.name: Inscription
label.description: Cette zone contient les des inscriptions se trouvant sur l'objet. L'inscription désigne les mots ou les lettres tels qu'ils figurent sur l'objet. La translittéreation peut être donnée en anglais ou en français.

label.name: Signature
label.description: This field provides details about the form and location of the artist's or maker's signature on the object.

label.name: Signature
label.description: Cette zone donne des détails sur la configuration et l'emplacement de la signature sur l'objet.

label.name: History of Use
label.description: This field describes the original and subsequent use made of the object.

label.name: Fonctions
label.description: Cette zone contient des renseignements descriptifs sur les usages originaux et subséquents de l'objet.

label.name: Narrative
label.description: This field contains comments, stories, or contextual information about the object. Can include associated people, organizations, places, and events in the object's history, comments from an interpretive/curatorial perspective, text of a wall label, entry from a published catalogue, etc.

label.name: Commentaires
label.description: Cette zone contient des commentaires, des récits et de l'information contextuelle sur l'objet. Elle peut contenir aussi le nom de personnes, d'organismes, de lieux et d'événements relatifs à l'histoire de l'objet, des commentaires liés à l'interprétation ou la conservation, le texte d'une étiquette murale, la notice d'un catalogue publié, etc.

label.name: Dimensions
label.description: Enter the dimensions of the item or its components, such as a frame.

label.name: Height
label.description: This field contains the measurement of the object's overall height.

label.name: Hauteur
label.description: Cette zone indique la hauteur maximale de l’objet.

label.name: Width
label.description: This field contains the measurement of the object's overall width.

label.name: Largeur
label.description: Cette zone indique la largeur maximale de l’objet.

label.name: Depth
label.description: This field contains the measurement of the overall depth.

label.name: Profondeur
label.description: Cette zone indique la profondeur maximale d’un objet.

label.name: Length
label.description: This field contains the measurement of the overall length.

label.name: Longueur
label.description: Cette zone indique la longueur maximale d’un object.

label.name: Diameter
label.description: This field contains the diameter measurement.

label.name: Diamètre
label.description: Cette zone contient la mesure du diamètre de l'objet.

label.name: Thickness
label.description: This field contains the overall thickness measurement.

label.name: Épaisseur
label.description: Cette zone contient la mesure de l'épaisseur maximale de l'objet.

label.name: Dimension remarks
label.description: This field contains remarks concerning the physical dimensions or comments about partial or questionable dimensions.

label.name: Remarques sur les dimensions
label.description: Cette zone contient des remarques sur les dimensions de l’objet, notamment des commentaires sur des dimensions partielles ou douteuses.

label.name: School/Style
label.description: This field contains the name of the style or stylistic association for the object. Fine art museums often use 'style' as a sub-division of the more general School/Style field.

label.name: Associations de style
label.description: Cette zone contient le nom du style ou des associations de styles de l'objet.

label.name: Publications
label.description: This field contains bibliographic references to publications which have mentioned or illustrated the object.

label.name: Publications
label.description: Cette zone contient les références bibliographiques qui ont mentionné ou illustré l’objet.

label.name: Period
label.description: This field contains the name of the historical period or any non-numeric chronological data associated with the object.

label.name: Période
label.description: Cette zone contient le nom de la période historique ou des données chronologiques non numériques portant sur l'objet.

label.name: Subject/Image
label.description: This field contains keywords or terms that refer to iconographic content to describe the subject or image of the object. It contains identification, description, or interpretation of what is depicted in and by a work or image. Subjects include things, places, activities, abstract shapes, decorations, stories, and events from literature, mythology, religion, or history.

label.name: Sujet ou image
label.description: Cette zone contient des mots clés ou des termes permettant la recherche sur le contenu iconographique (sujet ou image) de l'objet. Le contenu de cette zone réfère à l’identification, à la description ou à l’interprétation de l’iconographie représentée sur un objet ou dans une œuvre ou une image. Le sujet représenté peut inclure des choses, des lieux, des activités, des formes abstraites, des motifs décoratifs, des histoires ou des événements en lien avec la littérature, la mythologie, la religion ou l’histoire.

label.name: Culture
label.description: Name of the culture, people, or nationality from which the work originated.

label.name: Date de la mise à jour
Cataloguer Remarks
label.description: This field contains cataloguer's remarks pertinent to the object.

label.name: Remarques du catalogueur
label.description: Cette zone contient les remarques du catalogueur relatives à l'objet sur lequel porte l'enregistrement.

label.name: Cataloging references
label.description: This field indicates bibliographic references used by the cataloguer for cataloguing the object.

label.name: Références du catalogueur
label.description: Cette zone contient les références ou sources bibliographiques utilisées par le catalogueur pour classer l’objet.

label.name: Condition reporting
label.description: This field is used to describe the condition of an item.

label.name: Condition rating
label.description: Select the overall condition rating here.

label.name: Condition remarks
label.description: This field contains remarks about the condition of the object.

label.name: Examined by
label.description: This field identifies the examiners who assessed the overall condition of the object.

label.name: Date examined
label.description: This field indicates the date(s) on which the piece was examined for condition purposes.

label.name: Documentation
label.description: Upload any documentation you have here, such as handwritten condition reports.

label.name: Date de l'évaluation de l'état initial
label.description: Cette zone contient la date à laquelle on a déterminé l' Etat initial de conservation de l'objet sur lequel porte l'enregistrement.

label.name: Examinateur
label.description: Cette zone contient le nom de l'examinateur qui a déterminé l'état général de conservation de l'objet sur lequel porte l'enregistrement.

label.name: Remarques sur l'état de conservation
label.description: Cette zone contient des remarques sur l'état de conservation de l'objet sur lequel porte l'enregistrement.

label.name: Caption
label.description: Short descriptive caption for item.

label.name: External links
label.description: Add external links

label.name: Liens externes
label.description: ajouter liens externes

label.name: Object Type
label.description: Enter the descriptive modifier. Multiple terms should be separated by a semicolon and a space. Attributed data should be followed by space "?".

label.name: Type de l’objet
label.description: Inscrire les qualificatifs descriptifs de l'objet. Séparer les entrées multiples par un point-virgule suivi d'un blanc. Une donnée hypothétique doit être suivie d'un blanc et d'un point d'interrogation (?).

label.name: Title
label.description: This field contains the preferred title for the object. For fine art and other objects that are titled (e.g. books, CDs, records), the title is based on that assigned by the artist or writer.

label.name: Titre
label.description: Cette zone contient le titre de l'objet. Dans les beaux-arts, le titre du conservateur est fondé sur celui qui est donné par l'artiste.

label.name: Alternate object names
label.description: This field contains any foreign, native, archaic or other name variations for the object. Enter any foreign, native, archaic or other name variations.

label.name: Nom d'objet alternatif
label.description: Cette zone contient tous les termes utilisés pour désigner l’objet, autre que son nom normalisé. Il peut s’agir de variations étrangères, archaïques au autres de nom de l’objet.

label.name: Accession Date
label.description: This field indicates the date on which the object was legally accessioned by the institution.

label.name: Date d'accession
label.description: Cette zone contient la date d'accession légale, par l'établissement, de l'objet sur lequel porte l'enregistrement.

label.name: Acquisition Date
label.description: This field indicates the date that the object was acquired or registered.

label.name: Date d'acquisition
label.description: Cette zone contient la date d'acquisition ou d'enregistrement de l'objet sur lequel porte l'enregistrement.

label.name: Check this box if you hold the copyright for this item
Serial Numbers
label.description: This field contains the unique serial number assigned to the object by the maker.

label.name: Numéro de série
label.description: Cette zone contient le numéro de série attribué à l'objet par le fabricant.

label.name: Series Volume Author
label.description: This field contains the name of the author (not the artist or maker) of a book, portfolio or series that incorporates the object.

label.name: Nom de l'auteur de la série ou du volume
label.description: Cette zone contient le nom de l'auteur (là où il diffère du nom de l'artiste ou de l'artisan) du livre, du portfolio ou de la série d'où provient l'objet sur lequel porte l'enregistrement.

label.name: Series Volume Pub
label.description: This field contains the name of the publisher of the book, portfolio or series that incorporates the object.

label.name: Nom de l'éditeur de la série ou du volume
label.description: Cette zone contient le nom de la maison d'édition responsable de la publication du livre, du portfolio ou de la série d'où provient l'objet sur lequel porte l'enregistrement.

label.name: Series Volume Title
label.description: This field contains the title or name of the book, portfolio or series that incorporates the object.

label.name: Titre de la série ou du volume
label.description: ette zone contient, selon le cas, le titre ou le nom du livre, du portfolio ou de la série d'où provient l'objet sur lequel porte l'enregistrement.

label.name: Series Volume Place
label.description: This field gives the location of the publisher of the book, portfolio or series that incorporates the object.

label.name: Endroit de publication de la série ou du volume
label.description: Cette zone contient le nom de l’endroit où fut publié le livre, le portfolio ou la série d'où provient l'objet sur lequel porte l'enregistrement.

label.name: Series Volume Date
label.description: This field contains the date of the publication of the book, portfolio or series that incorporates the object.

label.name: Date de publication de la série ou du volume
label.description: Cette zone contient la date de publication du livre, du portfolio ou de la série d'où provient l'objet sur lequel porte l'enregistrement.

label.name: Numéro du volume de la série
Credit line
label.description: A credit line may be entered in the Accession or here. The credit line may express a memorial to a donor or relative of a donor, e.g., "Given in memory of Jane Doe." The credit line often appears on exhibit labels, for example, "Gift of Mr. and Mrs. John Doe."

label.name: Public Access Description
label.description: A description of the item intended for a public audience.

label.name: Exhibition label
label.description: Exhibit Label is a description of an artifact that may differ from the catalog description of an item.

label.name: Notes
label.description: Notes regarding item

label.name: Telephone/fax
label.description: Add Telephone/fax

label.name: Téléphone/fax
label.description: ajouter téléphone/fax

label.name: Email address
label.description: Add Email address

label.name: Courriel
label.description: Ajouter courriel

label.name: Biography
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Source of biography
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Date founded
label.description: Date organization was founded.

label.name: Date incorporated
label.description: Date organization was incorporated.

label.name: Date of liquidation
label.description: Date organization was liquidated.

label.name: Brand names
label.description: Brand names under which the organization operated.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Remarks
label.description: Add remarks

label.name: Remarques
label.description: ajouter remarques

label.name: Loan term
label.description: Add loan term

label.name: Durée du prêt
label.description: ajouter durée du prêt

label.name: Transporteur
label.description: Ajouter transporteur

label.name: Instructions
label.description: Enter any instructions regarding the accession.

label.name: Instructions
label.description: Ajouter instructions.

label.name: Restrictions
label.description: Enter any restrictions regarding the accession or item.

label.name: Authorization date
label.description: The date when the loan was authorized.

label.name: Authorization date
label.description: The date when the loan was authorized.

label.name: Date d'autorisation
label.description: La date à laquelle le prêt a été autorisé.

label.name: Loan in date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Loan in date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Prêt planifié
label.description: La date où un prêt rejoindra l'institution.

label.name: Loan out date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Loan out date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Date de sorti du prêt
label.description: La date à laquelle un prêt entrera dans l'institution.

label.name: Loan return date
label.description: The date a loan is due back to the lending institution.

label.name: Loan return date
label.description: The date a loan is due back to the lending institution.

label.name: Date de retour de prêt
label.description: La date à laquelle le prêt doit être retourné à l'institution prêtante.

label.name: Loan note
label.description: General information about the loan.

label.name: Loan note
label.description: General information about the loan.

label.name: Rrêt - note
label.description: Informations générales sur le prêt.

label.name: Loan purpose
label.description: General information about the purpose of loan.

label.name: Loan purpose
label.description: General information about the purpose of loan.

label.name: Objectif du prêt
label.description: Information générale sur la proposition de prêt.

label.name: Loan conditions
label.description: A statement of the conditions on a loan.

label.name: Loan conditions
label.description: A statement of the conditions on a loan.

label.name: Conditions de prêt
label.description: Un rappel des conditions du prêt.

label.name: Site
label.description: Enter the name of the site from which the artifact was recovered.

label.name: Bag number
label.description: Record the original Bag Number that was assigned to the item by the field collector. This number refers to the provenance of an archaeological specimen.

label.name: Box number
label.description: Record the original Box Number that was assigned to the item by the field collector. This number refers to the provenance of an archaeological specimen.

label.name: Dating method
label.description: se this field to record which archaeological dating method was used to date the object.

label.name: Datum
label.description: Datum describes a point, line, or surface used as a reference for mapping. Archaeological measurements are taken from a fixed point to insure comparability of data. Use the Datum Field to record the fixed point from which measurements were taken fro this item.

label.name: Feature
label.description: An archaeological feature is any definable archaeological phenomenon which is discernibly different from the surrounding deposits. Feature is often defined as material remains that cannot be transported such as fire pits, storage pits, wall foundations, and post holes.

label.name: Level
label.description: Level is the basic vertical subdivision of an excavation unit, defined metrically, such as in 5, 10, or 20 centimeter levels. Level may also refer to s natural layers of stratification within the excavation unit.

label.name: Stratum
label.description: One of several parallel layers of material arranged one on top of another.

label.name: Unit
label.description: A unit is defined as a basic area of horizontal control in an excavation; usually a test pit, trench, or a standard-sized square. Units are organized in a system of perpendicular lines and equally spaced points to form a rectangle which is used as a frame of locational reference on an archaeological site. Many archaeological sites are surveyed by measuring from a grid enclosing the site. It is a rectilinear system of X, Y coordinates which is established over the area to be excavated so that spatial control can be maintained.

label.name: Assemblage Zone
label.description: Bio-stratigraphic unit as defined and identified by a group of associated fossils rather than by a single index fossil.

label.name: X Coordinate
label.description: The x co-ordinate is a measurement taken from a reference datum along the x axis of a grid square enabling the archaeologist to plot the three-dimensional position of an archaeological find and record its location from a known datum point.

label.name: Y Coordinate
label.description: The y co-ordinate is a measurement taken from a reference datum along the x axis of a grid square enabling the archaeologist to plot the three-dimensional position of an archaeological find and record its location from a known datum point.

label.name: Z Coordinate
label.description: The z co-ordinate is a measurement taken from a reference datum along the x axis of a grid square enabling the archaeologist to plot the three-dimensional position of an archaeological find and record its location from a known datum point.

label.name: Getty Art and Architecture Thesarus
label.description: Enter terms from the Getty Art and Architecture Thesarus that can describe this item.

label.name: Getty Union List of Artist Names
label.description: Enter names from the Getty Union List of Artist Names that can describe this item.

label.name: Library of Congress subject headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Library of Congress Name Authority File
label.description: Enter authority files from the Library Of Congress that apply to this item.

label.name: Age
label.description: Age, when used in the context of natural history specimens, refers to the age of the biological specimen at death. For example, if known, the age may be entered as "5 years". If the exact age of the specimen is not known you may enter a range such as "20-30" or in many cases the entry will be in the following form, "Adult", Juvenile", "Unknown".

label.name: Habitat
label.description: Habitat is used to record the area or type of environment in which a biological specimen lives or occurs.

label.name: Sex of Specimen
label.description: Use the sex field to record the sex of the biological specimen; male, female, hermaphrodite, or unknown.

label.name: Skeletal Elements
label.description: Elements refers to the separate bones present in a biological sample. For example: a skeletal specimen may not contain all elements of the skeleton. Use this field to record the elements that are present.

label.name: Kingdom
label.description: Kingdom is the highest taxonomic classification into which organisms are grouped, based on fundamental similarities and common ancestry.

label.name: Phylum
label.description: Phylum is a primary division of a kingdom, as of the animal kingdom, ranking above class in taxonomic classification.

label.name: Class
label.description: Class is a taxonomic category ranking below a phylum and above an order.

label.name: Order
label.description: Order is a taxonomic category of organisms ranking above a family and below a class.

label.name: Family
label.description: Family is a taxonomic category of related organisms ranking below an order and above a genus.

label.name: Sub Family
label.description: A taxonomic category of related organisms ranking between a family and a genus.

label.name: Genus
label.description: Genus is the taxonomic category ranking below family and above species and generally consisting of a group of species exhibiting similar characteristics.

label.name: Species
label.description: This field appears on the Natural History section of the objects catalog screen. Enter the name of the species.

label.name: Chemical Composition
label.description: Chemical composition reflects the number of different atoms making up a molecule. For example: the chemical formula for quartz is SiO2, which shows that each molecule consists of one atom of silica (Si) bonded to two atoms of oxygen (O2).

label.name: Crystal System
label.description: The crystal shape is an important clue to the identification of a particular mineral. The crystal system is based on the number of axes of symmetry developed. An axis is an imaginary line running through the crystal around which it can be turned to produce the same appearance from more than one side.

label.name: Formation
label.description: The fundamental lithostratigraphic unit, a thickness of, outcropping of, body of rock and soil associated with defined and identifiable characteristics, with a deposition consistent with a certain geologic time and/ or sequence of events, each geologic formation has a different total aspect of life from that above or below.

label.name: Fossils
label.description: Use this field to enter the type of fossils that are present in a rock specimen.

label.name: Fracture
label.description: record the nature of the surface left behind when a piece of mineral is broken possible entries include; "conchoidal" or "uneven."

label.name: Grain Size
label.description: grain size is an indicator of how a rock was formed and its composition. This field is used to record the grain size of the specimen.

label.name: Hardness
label.description: In geology, hardness is the property of resisting abrasion or scratching. It is measured by the MOH table of hardness. 1 is the softest and 10 is the hardest.

label.name: Lithology
label.description: 1. A lateral, map able subdivision of a designated stratigraphic unit, distinguished from adjacent subdivisions on the basis of lithology. 2. The rock record of any sedimentary environment.

label.name: Luster
label.description: The fresh surface of a mineral will reflect light in a characteristic way. This is known as luster. The different lusters are defined by means of comparison with the luster of everyday objects.

label.name: Occurence
label.description: Describe the geological conditions under which a rock or mineral is formed. For example, "olivine forms only in basic igneous rocks"

label.name: Pressure
label.description: The process by which rocks are altered in composition, texture, or internal structure by extreme heat, pressure, and the introduction of new chemical substances. Indicate the level of pressure present when the rock specimen was formed.

label.name: Specific Gravity
label.description: Specific Gravity is the weight of a mineral compared with the weight of an equal volume of water.

label.name: Streak
label.description: The diagnostic mark left by a mineral as it is scratched across a hard rough surface.

label.name: Stage
label.description: A subdivision in the classification of stratified rocks, ranking just below a series and representing rock formed during a chronological age.

label.name: Surface Process
label.description: Surface process refers to changes in the surface of a rock or mineral due to environmental processes. For example: Weathering, Stream action, Marine action, Glacier action, Wind action.

label.name: Temperature
label.description: The temperature field is used to record, in a general way, the temperature at which a metamorphic rock was formed. Metamorphic rock is changed due to extreme conditions of pressure and temperature. Different minerals crystallize at different temperatures in metamorphic aureoles (the area surrounding an igneous intrusion near a lava flow), therefore the mineralogy of a rock close to the intrusion will be different from that farther away.

label.name: Varieties
label.description: Record any variation of the mineral that may occur. For example: quartz occurs in various colors due to the inclusion of mineral impurities. These may be recorded, separated by commas; rock crystal, milky quartz, smoky quartz, amethyst.

label.name: Era
label.description: The longest division of geologic time, made up of one or more periods.

label.name: Epoch
label.description: A unit of geologic time that is a division of a period.

label.name: Purchase date
label.description: This field indicates the date when the object was purchased by the institution.

label.name: Date de l'achat
label.description: Cette zone contient la date de l'achat de l’objet faisant l'objet de l'enregistrement.

label.name: Purchase price
label.description: This field contains the purchase price, in Canadian dollars, of the object.

label.name: Coût d'achat
label.description: Inscrire le coût d'achat en dollars canadiens.

label.name: Appraised value
label.description: This field indicates the appraised value, in Canadian dollars, of the object.

label.name: Valeur d'estimation
label.description: Cette zone indique la valeur évaluée, en dollars canadiens, de l'objet.

settings.setting: Cette zone contient le numéro d'accession de l'objet. Si un seul numéro a été attribué à l'objet, il doit être inscrit dans la présente zone. Idéalement, le numéro d'accession est un identificateur unique.

This field contains the museum accession number of the object. If there is only one number to identify the object, it should be entered here. Ideally, the accession number is a unique record identifier.

Cette zone contient le nom usuel de l'objet sur lequel porte l'enregistrement. Inscrire le nom de l'objet au singulier. Les termes reliés à la classification de l’objet ne doivent pas être inscrits dans cette zone. Une donnée hypothétique doit être suivie d'un blanc et d'un point d'interrogation (?). Inscrire le terme en majuscule. Éviter l’usage d’abréviations.

Enter the object name in singular form. Classification terms should not be entered in this field. Uncertain data should be followed by space and "?". Record the term in Uppercase. Avoid abbreviations.
This field contains the name of the special or major collection or donation that includes the object.
Cette zone contient le nom d’une collection ou d’un don spécial ou majeur dont fait partie l’objet.
Cette zone contient le nombre d'objets décrits dans le document, indiqué en nombre entier seulement.
This field records the number of objects described in the document, and is expressed only as an integer (whole number).
Cette zone contient le nom des personnes qui ont procédé à l'estimation de la valeur du l’objet.
This field indicates the name of the individual responsible for assigning the appraised value to the object.
Nom de l'artiste, de l'artisan ou du fabricant
Cette zone contient le nom des artistes, artisans ou fabricants responsables de la conception ou de l'exécution de l'objet.
This field indicates the name of the artist, maker or manufacturer responsible for the design, execution, or manufacture of the object.
Cette zone décrit le mode d'acquisition de l'objet sur lequel porte l'enregistrement.
This field indicates the date that the object was acquired or registered.
Cette zone contient le nom des personnes responsables des renseignements catalographiques relatifs à l'objet sur lequel porte l'enregistrement.
This field indicates the name of the individual responsible for providing catalogue data on the object.
Dates de début et de fin
